How can I list all available currencies on the Verus network?

You can list all available currencies on the Verus network by using the `listcurrencies` command. This command can be executed in two ways: through the Verus command-line interface or by using a JSON-RPC call.

Examples:
> verus listcurrencies true
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "listcurrencies", "params": [true] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
